drivers.name: foo2zjs
drivers.comments:
This driver is available in the Ghostscript Printer Application

This is a driver originally developed for the Minolta magicolor 2300 DL network color laser printer which uses the Zenographics protocol.

This driver will also work for the HP LaserJet 1000, 1005, 1018, 1020, 1022, P1102, P1566, P1606dn, P2035, and other Zenographics-based printers.

Note that these HP LaserJet models need their firmware loaded into the printer everytime when the printer is turned on. Please follow the instructions comming with the driver.

Till Kamppeter has tested this driver on the LaserJet 1022 and there the driver works very well. It is faster and more reliable then the HPIJS driver for the PCL 5e mode of this model.

PPD files (and the Foomatic XML files to generate them) come with the driver, therefore we do not supply PPDs here on the OpenPrinting site.

notes:
The magicolor 2430 DL is a network color laser printer with a 2005 street price of $500 USD. This printer is supported by a free CUPS driver supplied by Konica Minolta and also by the "foo2zjs" free software printer driver. Note that the older Minolta magicolor 2430 DL and the newer Konica Minolta magicolor 2430 DL are not 100% equal. So it is not sure whether the Minolta magicolor 2430 DL perhaps also works with the driver from Konica Minolta.

Consumables/Refills:
Toner Black (4500 prints) - $79
Toner Yellow (4500 prints) - $119
Toner Magenta (4500 prints) - $119
